AJAX Implementations

Fetch API

Modern promise-based AJAX


async function fetchData() {
    try {
        const response = 
            await fetch(url);
        const data = 
            await response.json();
        return data;
    } catch (error) {
        console.error(error);
    }
}
XMLHttpRequest

Traditional AJAX method


const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhr.open("GET", url);
xhr.onload = function() {
    if (xhr.status === 200) {
        const data = 
            JSON.parse(xhr.response);
        handleData(data);
    }
};
xhr.send();
jQuery AJAX

jQuery's AJAX implementation


$.ajax({
    url: url,
    method: "GET",
    dataType: "json",
    success: function(data) {
        handleData(data);
    },
    error: function(xhr, status, error) {
        handleError(error);
    }
});
Try it out!

Click the buttons below to see each AJAX method in action.
